titles.title: COMBAT Act
To amend the Trafficking Victims Protection Act of 2000 to provide for a comprehensive domestic human trafficking estimate, and for other purposes.
Collecting Official Measurements and Baselines to Assess Trafficking Act of 2019
COMBAT Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary:
Collecting Official Measurements and Baselines to Assess Trafficking Act of 2019 or the COMBAT Act
This bill requires the Department of Homeland Security to undertake a study to determine the extent of human trafficking in the United States, including estimates of the number of victims.
